name: Deval Pandya
description: Versatile Computer Science graduate with a robust academic foundation, including a 4.0 GPA in a Master's program from Arizona State University, and hands-on experience in data analysis, machine learning, and software engineering. Proven ability to develop scalable ML pipelines, optimize complex systems, and lead high-impact projects, demonstrated through internships and professional roles at JP Morgan Chase, ANB Systems, and research contributions at Arizona State University.
